description: This file is a configuration script for ESLint tailored for a Vue.js project using TypeScript, Vitest, and Prettier. It defines ESLint configurations, file matching patterns, ignored directories, and extensions for `.vue` files.

methods.name: defineConfigWithVueTs
methods.description: Function that defines and returns an ESLint configuration object, combining various Vue, TypeScript, and Vitest settings, with support for multiple configuration blocks.
